mapper.sql: WF_GUID, WF_NAME, WF_CREATE_TIME, WF_LEASE_TIME, WF_GRACE_TIME, WF_LEASE_EXPIRY_TIME, WF_LEASE_COUNT, WF_REQUEST_TEXT, WF_STATUS, WF_SIGNAL, WF_PARENT_GUID, WF_FINISH_TIME, WF_FUNCTION
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from fs_work_flow_tracker
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into fs_work_flow_tracker (WF_GUID, WF_NAME, WF_CREATE_TIME, WF_LEASE_TIME, WF_GRACE_TIME, WF_LEASE_EXPIRY_TIME, WF_LEASE_COUNT, WF_REQUEST_TEXT, WF_STATUS, WF_SIGNAL, WF_PARENT_GUID, WF_FINISH_TIME, WF_FUNCTION) values (#{wfGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wfName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{wfLeaseTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now()+interval #{wuGraceTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} second, #{wfLeaseExpiryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{wfLeaseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wfRequestText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wfStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wfSignal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wfParentGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wfFinishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{wfFunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update fs_work_flow_tracker
WF_GUID = #{record.wfGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WF_NAME = #{record.wfName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WF_CREATE_TIME = #{record.wfCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WF_LEASE_TIME = #{record.wfLeaseTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
WF_GRACE_TIME = #{record.wfGraceTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
WF_LEASE_EXPIRY_TIME = #{record.wfLeaseExpiryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WF_LEASE_COUNT = #{record.wfLeaseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},

WF_STATUS = #{record.wfStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WF_SIGNAL = #{record.wfSignal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WF_PARENT_GUID = #{record.wfParentGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WF_FINISH_TIME = #{record.wfFinishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WF_FUNCTION = #{record.wfFunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update fs_work_flow_tracker set WF_GUID = #{record.wfGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WF_NAME = #{record.wfName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WF_CREATE_TIME = #{record.wfCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WF_LEASE_TIME = #{record.wfLeaseTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, WF_GRACE_TIME = #{record.wfGraceTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, WF_LEASE_EXPIRY_TIME = #{record.wfLeaseExpiryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WF_LEASE_COUNT = #{record.wfLeaseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WF_REQUEST_TEXT = #{record.wfRequestText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WF_STATUS = #{record.wfStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WF_SIGNAL = #{record.wfSignal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WF_PARENT_GUID = #{record.wfParentGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WF_FINISH_TIME = #{record.wfFinishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WF_FUNCTION = #{record.wfFunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update fs_work_flow_tracker
WF_NAME = #{wfName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WF_CREATE_TIME = #{wfCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WF_LEASE_TIME = #{wfLeaseTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
WF_GRACE_TIME = #{wfGraceTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
WF_LEASE_EXPIRY_TIME = #{wfLeaseExpiryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WF_LEASE_COUNT = #{wfLeaseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},

WF_FUNCTION = #{wfFunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where WF_GUID = #{wfGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
